alert.note: Alert for Wilkes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 7:55PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Wilkes County through 830 PM EDT... At 755 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dockery to near North Wilkesboro to near Boomer. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Wilkesboro... Wilkesboro... Ronda... Traphill... Windy Gap... Mulberry... and Abshers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northwestern North Carolina...and southwestern Virginia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern Virginia.
